title: Pool Party Rek'Sai bug
body: Im playing on EUNE and everytime I got my w maxed and want to go back this happens. Please fix it.

replies.body:
Not only is it the Pool Party skin, it's also her Eternum (sp?) skin. Can't confirm the Classic, but Eternum and Pool Party recalls are both bugged.
EDIT: So because the classic skin doesn't have a unique recall while burrowed, it isn't affected. Unburrowed it works fine. 

EDIT 2: The bug only shows itself if you have already burrowed, and then unburrowed. If you cancel the recal after the bug shows, she is still unburrowed, so her actual status doesn't change, only the graphical part. (Tested on Eternum skin)

Hey DOGEWOWLOL,

This issue should be resolved!
Same for me, replicated it with one, two and three ranks in W. Happens both when burrowed and when unburrowed.
i dont get it what is happening?
Pretty much when you burrow or recall while burrowed, it cancels the last bit of her un-burrowed recall

Hey! Thanks for sharing my video :D I feel pretty cool

Anyways! I'm having the same problem too :c I was pretty disappointed because I was really looking forward to this skin {{item:3070}}

I am experiencing the same bug as well. It even happens when I don't even have my w.
I play on the NA servers.
